entry.title: Grabbing Windows Wi-Fi Passwords with the O.MG Cable | HakByte

media:group.media:title: Grabbing Windows Wi-Fi Passwords with the O.MG Cable | HakByte
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we take advantage of a Windows feature to dump the Wi-Fi credentials saved on an unlocked Windows machine. And automate the process with O.MG cable so that any Windows device plugged into the cable will send its saved Wi-Fi credentials to our own server.
OMG Setup video: https://youtu.be/UJmYrZliVN4
Payload: https://github.com/hak5/omg-payloads/blob/master/payloads/library/credentials/wifigrabber/payload.txt
Chapters: 0:00 Intro 1:46 Finding the Payload 2:35 How this payload Works 3:45 Setup a Webhook 4:35 Fixing some Typos 5:48 Hiding the CMD Window 8:52 Retrieving the Passwords 10:07 Closing Thoughts

entry.title: Create Your First O.MG Payload ft. MG

media:group.media:title: Create Your First O.MG Payload ft. MG
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we look at a cable capable of hacking any device it's plugged into. We'll go over everything you should consider when buying an OMG cable and then go over the basics of ducky script and writing your first payload!
Links: Buy O.MG Gear: https://hak5.org/omg
O.MG Product support: https://hak5.org/discord #omg-support channel
Web Flasher: https://o-mg.github.io/WebFlasher/
Flasher Drivers: https://www.silabs.com/developers/usb-to-uart-bridge-vcp-drivers
Chapters: 0:00 Intro 1:03 What is an OMG Cable 2:20 Choosing the right Cable 3:35 Web Flasher 6:30 Web Interface 7:55 Crafting a Payload 10:40 Closing thoughts

entry.title: How Hackers Use DNS Spoofing to Phish Passwords (WiFi Pineapple Demo)

media:group.media:title: How Hackers Use DNS Spoofing to Phish Passwords (WiFi Pineapple Demo)
media:group.media:description:
@Alex Lynd demonstrates how DNS Spoofing & DNS Cache Poisoning can be used to phish your online passwords. This demo uses a WiFi Pineapple to create a Rogue Access Point that can intercept & modify WiFi traffic. This video is sponsored by PCBWay: https://www.pcbway.com Hak5 -- Cyber Security Education, Inspiration, News & Community since 2005 -----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆ Buy a Nugget & Support the Show: https://hakcat.com Buy a WiFi Pineapple: https://shop.hak5.org/products/wifi-pineapple
Pineapple Rogue AP / Mitm: https://youtu.be/fOmDNn2aXXA Nginx Setup Video: https://youtu.be/CBaiRVKRfuM Pineapple Setup Guide: https://docs.hak5.org/wifi-pineapple Phishing Page Demo: https://gist.github.com/AlexLynd/7fcced41f9a998dea72010ed2f73e679 -----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆ Alex's Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlexLyndAlex's Website: http://alexlynd.comAlex's GitHub: https://github.com/AlexLynd -----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆ Chapters:
Intro @AlexLynd 00:00 What is DNS? 00:19 DNS Cache Poisoning 00:54 DNS Attack Overview 01:18 Tools You'll Need 01:37 PCBWay Ad 01:43 Pineapple Setup 01:57 Rogue AP Overview 02:16 Modifying DNS Records 03:33 Clear DNS Cache 05:42 Disclaimer and Overview 05:57 Setting up a Webserver 06:28 Phishing Page Overview 07:25 Attack Demo 07:50 Mitigating Attacks 08:27 Outro 08:46 -----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆ Our Site → https://www.hak5.org Shop → http://hakshop.myshopify.com/ Subscribe → https://www.youtube.com/user/Hak5Darren?sub_confirmation=1 Support → https://www.patreon.com/threatwire Contact Us → http://www.twitter.com/hak5 -----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆-----☆
